SEARCH
Package com.example.rupizzeria

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizzeria.Pizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object
Abstract class representing a Pizza with crust, size, and toppings. Different types of pizzas will extend this class and implement the price method.
Author:
Vy Nguyen, Shahnaz Khan
